key.name: panel-position
key.description: Position in the top panel: left, center, or right

key.name: panel-index
key.description: Index position within the panel (0 = first position)

key.name: max-length
key.description: Maximum number of characters to display in the panel (0 = unlimited)

key.name: show-session-label
key.description: Show the [session] prefix in the panel label

key.name: truncate-from-start
key.description: Show the end of the string when truncating (true = end, false = beginning)

key.name: auto-switch-on-session-exit
key.description: Automatically switch to another session when the current one exits
